dataList.name: Coin
dataList.desc: Hong Lu deals +0.5% damage for every Coin Artifacts used for the second round of the Family Hierarch Evaluation. Candidates without any remaining coins, either lost or taken by force, will be immediately eliminated.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Hong Lu deals +0.5% damage for every Coin

dataList.name: Worn Entry Card
dataList.desc:
A broken and battered entry card.
Maybe it opens a door somewhere.

dataList.name: Heavenly King's Heartmending Pill
dataList.desc: Turn End: 1 ally with the least SP heals 10 SP

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Every Turn End: 1 ally with the least SP heals 10 SP at Turn End

dataList.name: Tranquil Lotus Bolus
dataList.desc: Turn End: heal 5% HP for 1 ally with the least HP percentage (rounded down)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Heal the affected unit by 5% HP

dataList.name: Sanguine Blossom Bolus
dataList.desc: Turn Start: among allies who lost HP, 1 ally with the least HP percentage deals +(missing HP percentage / 4)% damage (rounded down)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: The affected unit deals +(missing HP percentage /4)% damage

dataList.name: Tenacity Bolus
dataList.desc: Turn Start: 1 ally with the highest max HP gains [DefenseUp] equal to the number of times that unit was hit by the enemies' Skill Attacks (max 6)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain Defense Level Up equal to the number of times this unit was hit

dataList.name: Flower in the Mirror
dataList.desc: Every Turn Start: inflict 3 [Burst] Potency and +1 [Burst] Count to all enemies without [Burst] (for Focused Encounters, all Parts) How heartless they are—the flowing stream and the wilting blossom both.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict 3 Rupture Potency and +1 Rupture Count to all enemies/Parts without Rupture

dataList.name: Accursed Codex
dataList.desc: First Turn Start of an Encounter: every Identity on the field loses 5 SP and gains 1 [ShamrockResultUp] and 1 [ShamrockDamageUp] for 3 turns.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deployed units lose 5 SP; affected units gain Gluttony Power Up and Gluttony DMG Up for 3 turns

dataList.name: Madness-inscribed Codex
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start of an Encounter: every Identity on the field loses 5 SP and gains 1 [ShamrockResultUp] and 1 [ShamrockDamageUp] for this Encounter.
On Clash Lose, lose 5 SP; convert the Skill's final Coin to [SuperCoin]. (except E.G.O Skills; once per turn per Identity)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Combat Deployed units lose 5 SP; affected units gain Gluttony Power Up and Gluttony DMG Up for this Encounter
Lose 5 SP on Clash Lose. Convert the Skill's final Coin to Unbreakable Coin

dataList.name: Moon in the Water
dataList.desc: On Hit against enemies with 5+ Rupture Potency: gain 1 Poise Potency and +1 Poise Count (3 times per Skill) How heartless they are—the flowing stream and the wilting blossom both.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: On Hit against enemies with 5+ Rupture: gain Poise Potency and Count

dataList.name: Flower Mound
dataList.desc: Skills that inflict [Burst]: Clash Power +1, deal +10% damage If targets with 15+ [Burst] Potency is defeated After Attack, the Identity that defeated that unit gains 2 [AttackUp] next turn (3 times per Skill) Beneath the glacial moon I lay the blossom's soul to rest

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Skills that inflict Rupture: Clash Power +1, deal +10% damage
If a target with 15+ Rupture is defeated, the unit that defeated it gains 2 Offense Level Up next turn

dataList.name: Lightening Axe
dataList.desc:
Gain 1 [Charge] every time this unit consumes 10 cumulative [Charge] Count in this Encounter
Turn End: At 2+ [Charge], gain 1 [ParryingResultUp] next turn
On Hit with a Skill that consumed 5+ [Charge]: inflict 1 [Burst] Potency (3 times per Skill)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain 1 Charge every time this unit consumes 10 Charge Count
At 2+ Charge, gain 1 Clash Power Up next turn
On Hit with Skills that consumed 5+ Charge Count: inflict 1 Rupture

dataList.name: Heartrender Talisman
dataList.desc:
Gluttony Skills deal +10% damage against enemies with Deathrite effects
For Identities at -15 or less SP at Combat Start: convert the final Coin for their Skills into [SuperCoin] (once per turn per Identity; prioritizes the Skill in the leftmost Skill Slot; except E.G.O Skills)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gluttony Skills deal +10% damage against enemies with Deathrite effects
At -15 or less SP: convert the final Coin for their Skills into Unbreakable Coin

dataList.name: Bloodsevering Blade
dataList.desc:
Clash Power +1 when not at full HP.
When an affected unit hits, deal +1% damage for every ([Laceration] Potency on target + [Laceration] Count on target) (max 20%)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: When not at full HP, Clash Power +1
On Hit, deal +1% damage for every (Bleed Potency on target + Bleed Count on target)

dataList.name: Jin Gang Bolus
dataList.desc:
When taking damage, gain Skill Final Power +1 and deal +10% damage (activates for self-damages as well) next turn
When taking damage that brings a unit's HP down to 1, heal 50% HP, and the affected unit gains 2 [Enhancement] at Turn Start for the duration of that Encounter (once per Encounter)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Skill Final Power +1, deal +10% damage next turn
Heal 50% HP and gain 2 Attack Power Up for this Encounter

dataList.name: Faded Poster
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #1, #8 Deployed Identities]
After Attack: if the target is defeated, gain 2 [Breath] Potency and +2 [Breath] Count.
For this Encounter, each unit gains +1 Offense Level for every 1 enemy that is defeated at the 'After Attack' timing (max 3)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain 2 Poise Potency and +2 Poise Count
Offense Level +1 for every defeated enemy

dataList.name: Deep Claw Marks
dataList.desc: Gain 1 [ParryingResultUp] for 3 turns after Substituting in.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain 1 Clash Power Up for 3 turns after Substituting in

dataList.name: The Memory of Kong Family Annihilation
dataList.desc: Hong Lu's level rises to 55 Hong Lu's Uptie and Threadspin Tiers rise to Tier 4 'Remember the day ruin came to the Kong family, who have brought this destruction upon themselves through their grave transgressions. To violate the laws of Hongyuan is no tragedy—as such, it warrants no pity, only humiliation and scorn. This site of history stands as a monument to the inevitability of karma.'

dataList.name: Red Entry Card
dataList.desc:
A broken and battered red entry card.
Maybe it opens a door somewhere.
